summary: Completed comprehensive testing of authentication system for GÃ¼l Mobilya e-commerce. Backend auth APIs work perfectly (100%), but found critical frontend integration issues preventing proper user experience.

integration_issues.issue: onSuccess callback is empty, preventing real-time auth state updates after login/registration
integration_issues.impact: User must refresh page to see logged-in state

integration_issues.issue: Form not pre-filling with user data despite user being logged in
integration_issues.impact: Poor UX - logged-in users must manually re-enter their information

integration_issues.issue: User login status indicator not showing (blue login prompt shows instead of green user status)
integration_issues.impact: Users don't know their login status affects order linking

passed_tests: All backend auth APIs (registration, login, profile, orders) - 33/33 tests passed
User registration creates account and saves to localStorage
User login works and saves token to localStorage
Auth persistence works after page refresh
Account page displays user information correctly
Logout functionality works from dropdown and account page
Error handling for wrong passwords works
Cart functionality works with authenticated users
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical frontend auth integration: 1) Update Navbar AuthModal onSuccess callback to properly update AuthContext state, 2) Fix CheckoutPage to properly detect logged-in user and pre-fill form, 3) Fix checkout page user status indicator
